data.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 - Dark Sky Skin
data.detailed_description:
Reign down supreme on your enemy with the Dark Sky DLC pack, featuring a cosmic blue weapon skin. Usable across all gun models, it’s time to make it rain… bullets!

Features:
  • Dark Sky Weapon Skin

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
